data.title: Browse Awarded Books in the Library Catalog
data.text:
About

The catalog searches Thrall and nearly 50 other RCLS libraries.

Reserves

See an item you like? Click the Place Hold button and select which library you want it sent to once it's available.

RCLS will call you when items arrive unless you sign up for e-mail notices.

Ask a Librarian!

Our librarians can help you!

Research help and reading suggestions are just a click away!

You can also call our Reference Dept. at (845) 341-5461.

Read a good book?

Use RAVES! to suggest books or to explore some new and interesting reading possibilities!

Select a title, then click go:
